description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共天津市委代理书记、天津市市长。后因严重违纪被查处，判处有期徒刑十二年。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the acting Communist Party Secretary and Mayor of Tianjin. He was later investigated for serious disciplinary violations and sentenced to twelve years in prison.

nodes.id: 中国共产党天津市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党天津市委员会
en: Tianjin Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在天津市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄兴国的前任中共天津市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Huang Xingguo as the Communist Party Secretary of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄兴国的继任中共天津市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor to Huang Xingguo as the Communist Party Secretary of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 天津市的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共天津市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Communist Party Secretary of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄兴国的前任天津市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Huang Xingguo as the Mayor of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄兴国的继任天津市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor to Huang Xingguo as the Mayor of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省宁波市下辖的一个县，是黄兴国的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Ningbo City, Zhejiang Province, China, and the birthplace of Huang Xingguo.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机关。
description.en: The highest authority within the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal control institution of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国监察部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国监察部
en: Ministry of Supervision of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院负责廉政、纪检、监察的部门，2018年被撤销并入国家监察委员会。
description.en: Formerly the department under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for anti-corruption, discipline inspection, and supervision. It was abolished in 2018 and merged into the National Supervisory Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党台州地区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党台州地区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在台州地区的历史领导机关，后改为中共台州市委。
description.en: The historical leading organ of the Communist Party of China in the Taizhou region, later changed to the CPC Taizhou Municipal Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党台州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党台州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在台州市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Taizhou.

en: Central Party School of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会直属的、专门培训高级领导干部的学校。
description.en: An institution of higher education directly under the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China that specifically trains senior leaders.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of Zhejiang Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在浙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Zhejiang Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党宁波市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党宁波市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在宁波市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Ningbo.

nodes.id: 2015年天津港危化品仓库爆炸事故

zh-cn: 2015年天津港危化品仓库爆炸事故

description.zh-cn: 2015年8月12日在天津港发生的特大安全事故，时任市长黄兴国表示要对此负起主要责任。
description.en: A major safety accident that occurred at the Port of Tianjin on August 12, 2015. Then-mayor Huang Xingguo stated he would take primary responsibility for the incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国主席，中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中共十八大以来的反腐败工作

zh-cn: 中共十八大以来的反腐败工作

description.zh-cn: 自2012年中共十八大以来，在中国共产党内部展开的大规模反腐败运动，黄兴国是该运动中落马的高级官员之一。
description.en: A large-scale anti-corruption campaign launched within the Communist Party of China since the 18th National Congress in 2012. Huang Xingguo was one of the high-ranking officials who fell from power during this campaign.

description.zh-cn: 天津市高官，曾任天津市政协副主席、市公安局局长，在黄兴国之前落马。
description.en: A high-ranking official in Tianjin who served as Vice Chairman of the Tianjin CPPCC and Director of the Public Security Bureau. He fell from power before Huang Xingguo.

description.zh-cn: 天津市高官，曾任天津市副市长，在黄兴国之前落马。
description.en: A high-ranking official in Tianjin who served as Vice Mayor of Tianjin. He fell from power before Huang Xingguo.

description.zh-cn: 黄兴国的弟弟，据报道其落马可能涉及家族腐败。
description.en: Huang Xingguo's brother. It was reported that Huang's downfall might be related to family corruption.

description.zh-cn: 黄兴国的弟弟，据报道其落马可能涉及家族腐败。
description.en: Huang Xingguo's brother. It was reported that Huang's downfall might be related to family corruption.

description.zh-cn: 黄兴国的弟弟。
description.en: Huang Xingguo's brother.

description.zh-cn: 黄兴国的弟弟。
description.en: Huang Xingguo's brother.

nodes.id: 石家庄市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 石家庄市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 位于河北省石家庄市的中级人民法院，该法院一审审理并判决了黄兴国案。
description.en: The intermediate people's court located in Shijiazhuang, Hebei Province. This court conducted the first-instance trial and sentenced Huang Xingguo.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记。1985年曾考察象山县，由时任当地官员的黄兴国陪同。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee. He inspected Xiangshan County in 1985, accompanied by Huang Xingguo, who was a local official at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任浙江省委书记，曾陪同胡耀邦考察象山。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee, who accompanied Hu Yaobang during his inspection of Xiangshan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。时任中央办公厅副主任，曾陪同胡耀邦考察象山。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Premier of the State Council. Then Deputy Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, he accompanied Hu Yaobang during his inspection of Xiangshan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任基隆市市长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former mayor of Keelung City.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中国国民党荣誉主席。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Honorary Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中国国民党主席。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政商界人士，曾任外贸协会董事长。
description.en: Taiwanese political and business figure, former chairman of the Taiwan External Trade Development Council.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任中国国民党副主席、旺旺集团副董事长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, then Vice Chairman of the Kuomintang and Vice Chairman of the Want Want Group.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，大甲镇澜宫董事长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, Chairman of the Dajia Jenn Lann Temple.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省台州市的市辖区和市政府所在地。黄兴国主政台州时，力主将市府迁至此地。
description.en: A municipal district and the seat of the city government of Taizhou, Zhejiang. When Huang Xingguo was in charge of Taizhou, he strongly advocated for moving the city government to this location.

description.zh-cn: 政治骗子，黄兴国曾与其长期交往并受其影响。
description.en: A political swindler with whom Huang Xingguo had long-term contact and was influenced by.

nodes.id: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十二届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 12th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 2001年9月至2004年8月，在同济大学经济与管理学院管理科学与工程专业在职研究生学习，获管理学博士学位。
description.en: From September 2001 to August 2004, he pursued on-the-job postgraduate studies in Management Science and Engineering at the School of Economics and Management, Tongji University, and obtained a Doctor of Management degree.

description.zh-cn: 1995年9月至1996年7月，在中共中央党校一年制中青年干部培训班学习；1995年9月至1998年7月，在中共中央党校在职研究生班法学专业学习。
description.en: From September 1995 to July 1996, he studied in the one-year training program for young and middle-aged cadres at the Central Party School of the CPC; from September 1995 to July 1998, he pursued on-the-job postgraduate studies in law at the Central Party School of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 1973年9月加入中国共产党，2017年1月4日被开除党籍。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in September 1973, and was expelled from the party on January 4, 2017.

relationships.target: 中国共产党台州地区委员会
中国共产党台州市委员会
中国共产党浙江省委员会
中国共产党宁波市委员会
中国共产党天津市委员会

position.zh-cn: 常委, 副书记, 代理书记
position.en: Standing Committee Member, Deputy Secretary, Acting Secretary

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

position.zh-cn: 第十六、十七届中央候补委员, 第十八届中央委员
position.en: Alternate Member of the 16th and 17th Central Committee, Member of the 18th Central Committee

relationships.target: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2016年12月25日，其第十二届全国人民代表大会代表的职务被罢免。
description.en: On December 25, 2016, he was dismissed from his position as a deputy to the 12th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 在张高丽担任中共天津市委书记期间，黄兴国担任天津市市长。
description.en: While Zhang Gaoli was the Communist Party Secretary of Tianjin, Huang Xingguo served as the Mayor of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 在孙春兰担任中共天津市委书记期间，黄兴国担任天津市市长。
description.en: While Sun Chunlan was the Communist Party Secretary of Tianjin, Huang Xingguo served as the Mayor of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 接替调往中央的孙春兰，代理中共天津市委书记职务。
description.en: Succeeded Sun Chunlan, who was transferred to the central government, as the acting Communist Party Secretary of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 接替落马的黄兴国，出任中共天津市委书记。
description.en: Succeeded the disgraced Huang Xingguo as the Communist Party Secretary of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 接替戴相龙，出任天津市代市长。
description.en: Succeeded Dai Xianglong as the acting Mayor of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 在黄兴国被免职后，王东峰继任天津市市长。
description.en: After Huang Xingguo was dismissed, Wang Dongfeng succeeded him as the Mayor of Tianjin.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 宣布黄兴国因涉嫌严重违纪，正在接受组织调查。
description.en: Announced that Huang Xingguo was under investigation for suspected serious disciplinary violations.

relationships.source: 石家庄市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 以受贿罪判处黄兴国 aquifers徒刑十二年，并处罚金人民币三百万元。
description.en: Sentenced Huang Xingguo to twelve years in prison for bribery and fined him three million RMB.

relationships.source: 中共十八大以来的反腐败工作

description.zh-cn: 黄兴国是中共十八大以来首位落马的直辖市党政一把手。
description.en: Huang Xingguo was the first sitting party-government head of a direct-controlled municipality to be investigated since the 18th CPC National Congress.

relationships.source: 2015年天津港危化品仓库爆炸事故

description.zh-cn: 黄兴国作为时任天津市市长，表示要对该事故负起主要责任，此事对其政治生涯造成负面影响。
description.en: As the mayor of Tianjin at the time, Huang Xingguo stated he would take primary responsibility for the accident, which negatively impacted his political career.

description.zh-cn: 黄兴国在天津市委常委会议上强调“坚决维护习近平总书记这个核心”，主动“向习总书记看齐”。
description.en: At a meeting of the Tianjin Municipal Party Committee's Standing Committee, Huang Xingguo emphasized 'firmly upholding General Secretary Xi Jinping as the core' and proactively 'aligning with General Secretary Xi'.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，时任中共中央总书记胡耀邦考察象山，黄兴国全程陪同。
description.en: In 1985, then-General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee Hu Yaobang inspected Xiangshan, and Huang Xingguo accompanied him throughout the visit.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，时任中央办公厅副主任温家宝陪同胡耀邦考察象山，黄兴国亦在场陪同。
description.en: In 1985, Wen Jiabao, then Deputy Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, accompanied Hu Yaobang to inspect Xiangshan, and Huang Xingguo was also present to accompany them.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，时任浙江省委书记王芳陪同胡耀邦考察象山，黄兴国亦在场陪同。
description.en: In 1985, Wang Fang, then Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial Party Committee, accompanied Hu Yaobang to inspect Xiangshan, and Huang Xingguo was also present to accompany them.

description.zh-cn: 2012年7月率团访台期间，与时任国民党荣誉主席连战会面。
description.en: During his visit to Taiwan in July 2012, he met with then-Honorary Chairman of the Kuomintang, Lien Chan.

description.zh-cn: 2012年7月率团访台期间，受到吴伯雄接待。
description.en: During his visit to Taiwan in July 2012, he was received by Wu Po-hsiung.

description.zh-cn: 在被查前一天下午接见了时任中国国民党副主席胡志强。
description.en: He met with then-KMT Vice Chairman Jason Hu on the afternoon before he was investigated.

description.zh-cn: 在被查前一天下午接见了大甲镇澜宫董事长颜清标。
description.en: He met with Yen Ching-piao, Chairman of the Dajia Jenn Lann Temple, on the afternoon before he was investigated.

description.zh-cn: 主政台州时，力排众议，将台州市政府驻地从临海市搬迁至椒江区。
description.en: When he was in charge of Taizhou, he overcame opposition to move the seat of the Taizhou city government from Linhai to Jiaojiang District.

description.zh-cn: 黄兴国在担任天津市长期间，相信政治骗子荆毅能够“通天”，并与其长期交往，通过此人打探高层动态。
description.en: During his tenure as Mayor of Tianjin, Huang Xingguo believed that political swindler Jing Yi had high-level connections, maintained a long-term association with him, and used him to gather information about high-level affairs.
